element.title: Jobtrend
element.headline: Jobtrend
element.description: - competence match between education and job market
element.card1-text: Jobtrend is a tool for statiscal competence analysis, try it here
element.card2-text: Direct access to the large database of job listings
element.card3-text: Statistical programming of custom analyzes and charts
element.card4-text: Tool to analyse and visualize any available data
element.card5-text: Here you find guide and descriptions to get started
element.Footer: Research and Innovation, Business Academy Aarhus
element.card7-text: Administration tool for the competences inside the JSON file stored in the database.
